title: The Trojan Horse Affair - Part 1
description: A strange letter appears outlining a plot by Islamic extremists to infiltrate Birmingham schools. Hamza and Brian visit the supposed mastermind of the plot, and he tells them he did take over a bunch of schools – just not for the reasons in the letter.
author: rich@thislife.org (Serial Productions & The New York Times)
